originalText.text:
If I could give zero stars I would.
Horrible service workers have bad attitudes.  The female staff. The two male window staff are ok. Polite never bad attitudes. They never answer the phone so that you could make a complaint about the mail carriers you obviously can't read. Our building is 210N mail from 210M is piled up on top of the mailbox from the carrier who's always on her phone putting the other buildings mail in our boxes. My thing is where is she putting our mail¬ø?Going to call the 800 number to make a complaint. It's ridiculous unprofessional  and just plain laziness. When you go to the post office it opens at 8 you can sit inside at 9 they all should be at the windows they come to the window at 9 am but they don't begin working they're setting up their cash boxes ‚Åµ setting up their station for the day. When it should be done before 9am. They are understaffed never have any boxes or return receipts nothing. The worst service there and 125th street   Just quit if you don't want to work

originalText.text: Not enough staff. Ms. Joanne is the best window rep. I live in the area and not only do I not receive my mail everyday the mail carrier doesn't take the mail that don't belong to those of us that live in the building. Ms Joanne's customer service is the reason why I gave the 2 stars. Her customer service is always  5 üåü  service.

originalText.text: THE WORST USPS CENTER IN THE WHOLE CITY! Customer service is awful, the workers are extremely rude, whoever delivers large packages doesn‚Äôt deliver them and constantly states ‚Äúattempted delivery‚Äù because they don‚Äôt want to do their job. I‚Äôve been home for two days all day waiting for my package just for them to not even try to deliver them. Even then, they‚Äôre supposed to leave a slip and they don‚Äôt even do that. The only decent person there is the woman who answers the phone. Also, the person who delivers packages said they left my package inside of my mailbox and it wasn‚Äôt there. All I can assume is they stole it.

originalText.text: This post office don't deserve not even 1 star. One of the worse place to be at. All the employees are horrible, they all should be fire. I seen them kick people packages. Worse customer service.
